item.title: Regret Minimization
item.description: Regret minimization is a method to find optimal strategy in simultaneous games such as Rock-Paper-Scissors (RPS for short). We are going to explain what regret minimization is, especially the definition and how to use it, and we implement regret minimization through RPS game using Python.
